content.text:
# List of international presidential trips made by Michel Aoun

This is a list of international presidential trips made by Michel Aoun, the 13th President of Lebanon.
2017
{| class="wikitable"
! width="120" |Country
! width="100" |Areas visited
! width="90" |Date(s)
! width="550" |Notes
|-
|
|Riyadh
|9 January-10 January
|Met with King Salman.
|-
|
|Doha
|11 January
|Met with Emir Tamim bin Hamad Al Thani.
|-
|
|Cairo
|17 February
|Met with President Abdel Fattah Al Sisi.
|-
|
|Amman
|18 February
|Met with the King Abdallah II of Jordan
|-
|
|Amman
|23–29 March
|Attended 2017 Arab League summit.
|-
|
|New York City
|18-22 September
|Aoun participated to the 72th session of the United Nations General Assembly and met with several heads of state.
|-
|
|Paris
|25-29 September
|Met with President Emmanuel Macron.
|-
|
|Rome
|28-30 November
|Met with President Sergio Mattarella.
|-
|
|Istanbul
|13 December
|Attended Sixth Extraordinary Session of the Islamic Summit Conference.
|}
2018
{| class="wikitable"
! width="120" |Country
! width="100" |Areas visited
! width="90" |Date(s)
! width="550" |Notes
|-
|
|Kuwait City
|January 24–25
|Met with Emir Sabah Al-Ahmad Al-Jaber Al-Sabah.
|-
|
|Baghdad
|February 20–21
|Met with President Fuad Masum.
|-
|
|Yerevan
|February 22-23
|Met with President Serzh Sargsyan.
|-
|
|Dhahran
|April 14-16
|Attended the 2018 Arab League summit.
|-
|
|Strasbourg
|10–12 September
|Gave a speech at the European Parliament.
|-
|
|New York City
|23-26 September
|Aoun participated to the 73th session of the United Nations General Assembly and met with several heads of state.
|-
|
|Yerevan
|October 10-12
|Attended the 17th Francophonie Summit.
|}
2019
{| class="wikitable"
! width="120" |Country
! width="100" |Areas visited
! width="90" |Date(s)
! width="550" |Notes
|-
|
|Moscow
|25–26 March
|Met with President Vladimir Putin.
|-
|
|Tunis
|30-31 March
|Attending the Arab League Summit in Tunis.
|-
|
|New York City
|22-26 September
|Aoun participated to the 74th session of the United Nations General Assembly and met with several heads of state.
|}
2020
{| class="wikitable"
! width="120" |Country
! width="100" |Areas visited
! width="90" |Date(s)
! width="550" |Notes
|-
|
|Kuwait International Airport
|5 October
|Condolences on the death of Sabah Al-Ahmad Al-Jaber Al-Sabah.
|}
2021
{| class="wikitable"
! width="120" |Country
! width="100" |Areas visited
! width="90" |Date(s)
! width="550" |Notes
|-
|
|Doha
|21 November
|Met with Emir Tamim bin Hamad Al Thani.
|}
2022
{| class="wikitable"
! width="120" |Country
! width="100" |Areas visited
! width="90" |Date(s)
! width="550" |Notes
|-
|
|Rome
|20–23 March
|Met with President Sergio Mattarella.
|-
|
|
|21 March
|Met with Pope Francis.
|}
